# material(named:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the first material attached to the geometry with the specified name.

## Declaration

```swift
func material(named name: String) -> SCNMaterial?
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name of the material to be retrieved.

## Return Value

A material object with the specified name.

## Discussion

You can use the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMaterial/name] property of each [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMaterial] object to make managing your scene graph easier. Materials loaded from a scene file may have names assigned by an artist using a 3D authoring tool.

If a geometry has multiple materials attached with the same name, this method returns the first according to the order of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometry/materials] array.

## Managing a Geometry’s Materials

- **materials**: An array of [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMaterial] objects that determine the geometry’s appearance when rendered.
- **firstMaterial**: The first material attached to the geometry.
- **insertMaterial(_:at:)**: Attaches a material to the geometry at the specified index.
- **removeMaterial(at:)**: Removes a material attached to the geometry.
- **replaceMaterial(at:with:)**: Replaces a material attached to the geometry with another.
